briefTitle: Physiotherapy Program for Breast Cancer Women Following Surgery: A Pilot Clinical Trial
officialTitle: Effectiveness of Home-based and Early Institutional Physiotherapy Program for Breast Cancer Women Following Surgery: A Pilot Clinical Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women with breast cancer who require surgical resection

Exclusion Criteria:

* in ability to undergo 3 months of physical therapy program
